1.text: Pour 1½ to 2 cups (190 to 250 g) of your powder into a large bowl.

2.text: Add 1 cup (240 mL) of room-temperature water.

3.text: Mix the oobleck with your hands or a rubber spatula.

4.text: Add more powder or water, if needed.

5.text: Store the oobleck in a sealed container when you aren't playing with it.

6.text: Discard the oobleck into the trash, not the sink.

7.text: Place 16 ounces (450 g) of cornflour into a large bowl.

8.text: Stir some food coloring into 16 ounces (475 mL) of hot water, if desired.

9.text: Pour the water into the cornflour.

10.text: Mix the water and cornflour with your hands or rubber spatula.

11.text: Add more water or cornflour, if desired.

12.text: Keep the oobleck in a sealed container when you're done playing with it.

13.text: Place the oobleck into a plastic bag before throwing it away.
